name: Dreo Smart Wall Heater, IP24 Electric PTC Space for Indoor Use, 30 Oscillation, Adjustable Thermostat, Remote Control, Works With Alexa, 24H Timer, Easy-Mounted for Bedroom, Office
short_description: Powerful Performance: Thanks to the PTC heating system and optimized airflow design, the Dreo wall-mounted heater delivers powerful warmth with a strong 11.5 ft/s airflow and low 28 dB noise level. The 30° manual oscillation allows you to direct heat precisely, ensuring every corner is cozy Smart Control Convenience: Control your DREO Wall-Mounted Heater effortlessly using the included remote control, the DREO app, or even voice commands through Alexa. Enjoy multiple convenient control options even for adjusting the display screen's lighting Precise Temperature Control: Stay comfortable all winter thanks to DREO's precise ECO mode. It lets you set the ideal room temperature to stay warm and comfortable, while offering you an energy-efficient experience, including a temperature calibration function on the DREO app to keep temperature readings on point. Safe and Reliable: Constructed with 5 VA flame-retardant materials, overheat protection, and an IP24 waterproof rating, this heater ensures secure, worry-free warmth all day. Perfectly suited for bedrooms and offices, it offers peace of mind while keeping you cozy Easy Installation: The heater comes with a simple template for easy wall mounting. Just follow the guide to drill the correct holes, and your heater will securely hang on the wall, ready to provide warmth for your home. Power Cord: 70.8 inches Heating Coverage: To ensure maximum warm and comfortable, Use as a primary heat source for 150 square feet area, or up to 750 square feet as a supplementary source. Check if your room has proper insulation for optimal efficiency

name: GOFLAME Oil Filled Radiator Heater with Wheels, 1500W Quiet Operation, Portable Home Office Space Heater with Adjustable Thermostat, Tip-over & Overheated Protection, 3 Heat Settings, Energy Saving
short_description: Efficient Heating & Adjustable thermostat: With the maximum of 1500W power, our radiator heater provides energy-efficient heating for medium to large rooms that need constant heat in the winter. The heater equips with 3 heat settings(600w, 900w,1500w) and adjustable thermostat, you can adjust the temperature according your heating needs. Silent in Operation: Silent operation makes it perfect for any room, because it won't bother you from work, sleep, chat or anything. Especially in night when you are in sleep, it will give you a beautiful dream without making any noise. The heater is permanently sealed with oil and it’s never need to be refilled. Convenient to Move and Storage: Equipped with four heavy-duty caster wheels, our space heater provides easy movement to any room you want. And when the winter passed, you can take the base off and wrap the cord in the front of the heater, which ensures tidy and make the storage much easier. Safety Guarantee: The heater will shut off automatically when it's overheated. And when the heater tips over, it will also shut off immediately. Thermal slots maintain a low surface temperature, don't worry that you will be scalded accidently. Best for Small room: With the compact design, this radiator heater is suitable for any small room. It's your best choice in cold weather.

name: Tangkula 1500W Oil Filled Radiator Heater, Electric Space Heater with 3 Heating Modes, Adjustable Thermostat, Tip Over & Overheat Protection, Portable Oil Heater for Indoor Use, Home, Office (White)
short_description: Smart Thermostat with 3 Modes: Thanks to its 3 heat settings with 600W/900W/1500W, this radiator heater with 7 heating fins offers high-efficiency heating. Noiseless Operation & Wide Use: Unlike other fan heaters, our electric heater features oil as heat source, which provides mute operation (0dB) to avoid disturbing you while working, relaxing or sleeping. This versatile space heater is suitable for the living room, bedroom, dining room, office, etc. No Tools Needed Assembly: The assembly is easy with clear instruction and necessary parts. You just need to assemble the wheels. Besides, the oil-filled heater with smooth surface is easy to clean and maintain. Note: please do not place this heater near flammable materials. Overall dimension: 13" x 10" x 27.5"(L x W x H).

name: Comfort Zone Radiator Heater, Sealed Oil Filled Space Heater, Remote Control, Never Refill, Digital Display, Adjustable Thermostat, Tip-Over Switch & Overheat Protection, Home & Office, 1,500W
short_description: IDEAL FOR MEDIUM-SIZED ROOMS: Our oil-filled radiator heater is perfect for effectively heating rooms up to 1200 sq. ft. The heater is permanently sealed, eliminating the need for refilling. It features a safety tip-over switch that automatically shuts off the heater if it is accidentally knocked over, preventing potential hazards. The stay-cool housing ensures that the exterior remains cool to the touch, minimizing the risk of burns. Additionally, an overheat protection sensor is in place to prevent the heater from reaching unsafe temperatures. USER-FRIENDLY FEATURES: Experience convenience at its best with our oil radiator heater. The 360-degree swivel wheels make it effortless to move the heater from one room to another, providing flexibility and portability. Say goodbye to tangled cords with the built-in cord storage, keeping your space neat and organized. The auto-on/off timer allows you to set a desired heating schedule, ensuring optimal comfort and energy efficiency. Enjoy hassle-free operation and convenient features with our thoughtfully designed oil radiator heater. WHISPER-QUIET OPERATION: Our oil radiator heater operates silently, allowing you to experience cozy warmth in peace and tranquility. Say goodbye to distracting noise and enjoy a serene environment while the heater evenly distributes heat throughout the room. Whether you're working, studying, or simply relaxing, our heater ensures a comfortable and quiet atmosphere, making it ideal for offices, bedrooms, and any space where a peaceful environment is essential. Stay warm without any disturbance with our whisper-quiet oil radiator heater. COST-EFFECTIVE HEATING SOLUTION: Maximize energy efficiency and save on heating costs with our radiator heater. Instead of heating your entire house, this portable heater allows you to focus on warming up the specific room you're in. By targeting the desired area, you can reduce energy consumption and minimize heating expenses. Whether you're working, relaxing, or spending time in a particular space, our radiator heater offers a cost-effective solution to keep you warm and comfortable without breaking the bank.
product_description: The Comfort Zone digital oil filled radiator heater is an efficient and powerful way to heat medium sized rooms in your home. The heater’s compact design allows it to fit into a wide a variety of medium-sized spaces with ease and it has 5 warming fins as well and features two heat settings with silent operation and an adjustable digital thermostat with temperature display. It also has an on/off timer and comes equipped with convenient built-in cord storage and caster wheels that swivel smoothly in any direction to allow you to quickly roll the heater from one room to another. The oil radiator heater’s 5 channel design is permanently sealed and there no need to worry about refilling it. This sleek radiator heater is loaded with safety features to ensure you can rest warm and easy. It’s designed with a safety overheat protection sensor that prevents it from getting too hot and a safety tip-over switch that will instantly cut power if it is accidentally knocked over. The stay-cool body has a molded handle that lets you safely and comfortably transport this heater from room to room as needed.
